title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the project requirements, constraints, and objectives for the automated production line.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall system architecture, including hardware components, software systems, and integration points.

title: Develop Robot Control Software
description: Develop the software for controlling and coordinating the robots in the production line.

title: Implement Production Line Monitoring
description: Develop a monitoring system to track the production line's performance, efficiency, and potential issues.

title: Set up Database and Data Management
description: Design and implement a database system to store and manage production data, logs, and other relevant information.

title: Develop Security and Access Control
description: Implement security measures and access control mechanisms to ensure system integrity and data protection.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a CI/CD pipeline for automated building, testing, and deployment of the software components.
dependencies: Set up Database and Data Management

title: Conduct System Integration and Testing
description: Integrate all software and hardware components, and perform comprehensive testing to ensure the system meets requirements.
dependencies: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment

title: Deploy and Commission Automated Production Line
description: Install and configure the automated production line system in the production environment, and provide training and documentation.

title: Develop User and Maintenance Documentation
description: Create comprehensive documentation for end-users, operators, and maintenance personnel.
